text.body:
Hi,

We’re very excited to learn about the trial program for your newly launched vitiligo cream. We understand there is an opportunity for volunteers to try the product, and we would be thrilled to be part of this initiative.

Could you kindly share the details on how we can participate? We’re eager to contribute to the trial and provide feedback to support the success of this product.

Thank you for considering our request, and we look forward to your positive response.

Thanks,
Pei Ee
